00029 #ifndef _CHPFILEBUFFERWRITER_HEADER_
00030 #define _CHPFILEBUFFERWRITER_HEADER_
00031 
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <vector>
00034 #include "CHPGenotypeEntry.h"
00035 
00036 #define MAX_BUFFER_SIZE                         5242880         // 5 MB
00037 
00038 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00039 {
00040 class CHPFileBufferWriter
00041 {
00042 public:
00043         class GenotypeBufferEntry
00044         {
00045         public:
00046                 u_int8_t call;
00047                 float confidence;
00048                 float RAS1;
00049                 float RAS2;
00050                 float aaCall;
00051                 float abCall;
00052                 float bbCall;
00053                 float noCall;
00054         };
00055 
00056 public:
00058         CHPFileBufferWriter();
00059 
00061         ~CHPFileBufferWriter();
00062 
00064         void SetMaxBufferSize(int MaxBufferSize) { m_MaxBufferSize = MaxBufferSize; }
00065 
00067         void Cleanup();
00068 
00072         void Initialize(std::vector<std::string> *CHPFileNames);
00073 
00078         void WriteGenotypeEntry(int target, CHPGenotypeEntry &entry);
00079 
00081         void FlushBuffer();
00082 
00083 private:
00084         // Pointer to list of CHP file names.
00085         std::vector<std::string> *m_CHPFileNames;
00086 
00087         // List of targets used for storing genotype entries.
00088         std::vector< std::vector<GenotypeBufferEntry> > m_TargetEntryBuffers;
00089 
00090         // Buffer for storing genotype entry row indexes.
00091         std::vector<int> m_TargetEntryRowIndexes;
00092 
00093         // Size of the current buffer in bytes.
00094         int m_BufferSize;
00095 
00096         // Maximum size of buffer before it gets flushed
00097         int m_MaxBufferSize;
00098 };
00099 
00100 }
